story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_0100:
There are some signs that a pretty intense battle
happened here...
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_0500:
It turns out Giovanni can now make his
Pokémon Dynamax.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_0600:
I tried to take him on with Karen and Morty, but
he got us...
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_0700:
And then Silver came and challenged him to a
battle, but...
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_0800:
Heh. I now wield the power of Mega Evolution
and Dynamax. You’re no match for me.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_0900: No, we’re not done yet! We can still—
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1100: What, you’re not going to challenge me again?
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1200:
Hm... I see. You’re unwilling to overwork your
Pokémon that’s already been hurt in battle.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1300: That’s the end of that, then. I’ll be on my way.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1400: Where do you think you’re going?!
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1500: I still haven’t personally met the owner of Pasio.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1600: I’d like to pay him a visit very soon.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_1700:
But of course, I can’t go empty-handed. I have a
few things to prepare.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2000:
Yeah. He must’ve been talking about Lear.
His plan is to take over Pasio.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2100:
Let’s regroup and prepare. They won’t be able to
do anything right away.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2300:
I want to make him feel better, but what do I
even say?
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2400:
I’m sure he already knows all about his own
shortcomings and what he needs to do.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2500: All we can do is wait until he takes his next step.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2600:
That’s why you all should stick with him until
he’s ready.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2700:
He’s not always honest with himself, but he
thinks highly of you all.
story_teamrocket_03_02000/2401_1001_2800:
There’s nothing more reassuring than knowing you
have friends who’ve got your back.
